website_summaries.verdict: Vanilla flavor-infused plumper with no tingle.
pros: Hydrates well and helps diminish lip wrinkles
Comes in various shades as well as clear
cons: Not much product for the price

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this product. Can't wait to see results after continued use.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Hate the applicator, love product
customer_reviews.text: My 1st was clear, them tried the peachy light shade. I think it's called Toasted Apricot. It's not an immediate plumping action. You use it 1-2 times daily and lines do disappear (on me, anyway). The best lip 'health' beauty product I've used and I buy a lot of prestige brands. I'm in my 40s.
customer_reviews.author: LR

customer_reviews.title: so it's a good product. Just wish there was more product in ...
customer_reviews.text: My lips do look plumper and more filled out. I'm on my third tube, so it's a good product. Just wish there was more product in the container. Seems like it runs out fast for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Magnificent Lip Plumper
customer_reviews.text: The color is perfect. Yes, if applied twice daily it does work. There is no irritation or burning like what frequently occurs with lip plumpers....is very moisturizing. Love this product...I have clear and the spicy mauve....going to order another color!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Derting

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with an open mind that some of them work and some don't.....this one does. Its easy to apply and I feel like it has lasted forever and I still don't need another one.
customer_reviews.author: DogsRule

customer_reviews.title: Could done without this one
customer_reviews.text: These took a bit to get here. Pretty color just as pictured. But are veryyyyy sticky n thick & u had a really hard time getting them outta the container. Then it came rushing out n was wasted I ordered more than one n wish I hadn't have. Not a fan. I got zero lip plumping & the taste was awful. Smells good but taste is ewwwwahh.
customer_reviews.author: shinaTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Don't Waste Your Time or Money
customer_reviews.text: This is the biggest joke out there. This product does absolutely nothing except make your lips a little more pink than they would be naturally but there is absolutely NO plumping. Manufacturers need to stop making women feel bad because they have naturally thin lips and taking our money by offering false promises. I'm so tired of the duck lip trend and wish it would just be over. Don't waste your time or money on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Feeling plump
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product so far. I read a bunch of reviews with complaints about the smell, I didn't notice a bad smell but it doesnt smell nice and fruity either. I posted a before and after of my lips, I'm not sure how much plumping it does but it appears to do some. It burns a bit at first then wears off. I got the dusty taro color. To get the color in my photo I did two layers.
customer_reviews.author: MelBrd

customer_reviews.title: Works great under lipstick.
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a sample in a Sephora Play box, and ordered the full size here. It plumps up my lips a bit and makes them look 100x better than without. My lipstick goes on much better. I apply it before I put on makeup in the morning, and I put it on well over the edges to blur the outline of my lips - as I've gotten older they look worse and this corrects it.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Plumps nicely, color is perfect for everyday, not sticky, love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is my go-to lip every day lip product. The color is so natural but adds just enough hue to my lips that they don't blend in with the rest of my skin. It tingles a bit when you first apply, but its not uncomfortable at all. The plumping effect takes some time (~15 minutes) to max effect and then slowly wears off throughout the day. Unlike other lip glosses, this product is not sticky. It also tastes and smells fabulous.
customer_reviews.author: Erin B

customer_reviews.title: Wife hated it... gross smell, expensive
customer_reviews.text: Got this for the wife, we both hated it. It worked like an average plumper, but it had a very off-putting flavor/scent that reminded me of a bar that stunk of old cigarettes, which is my way of describing the chemical smell it produced. I think this product was maybe used twice before we chunked it. It has a nifty little clicking mechanism that expels the product with the click of a button, which seems like a needlessly expensive novelty mechanism that doesn't work very well - either delivering too much or not enough product.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with this product
customer_reviews.text: I applied the lip plumper following the directions closely. My lips got red and lumpy. The skin on my lips started to peel, too. I tried washing off the product, but It took over four hours before my lips started to look more normal. I love Grande Lashes and am extremely disappointed in their lip product.
customer_reviews.author: merry Mary book lover

customer_reviews.title: Your new favorite
customer_reviews.text: I love being able to buy a brand I trust right here on Amazon and have it quickly shipped to my door. Plumps naturally over time and gives you that “perfect pout” with each use. Love the rich color, applies well with the tipped top, and is perfect for a midday beauty boost. Feel and smile confident with the perfect mid point between stick and gloss.
customer_reviews.author: FlyLizFly

customer_reviews.title: great plumper alternative for avoiding fillers
customer_reviews.text: After reading many reviews I went ahead and invested my money in a tube of this lipgloss. I have to say it does make a noticeable difference to me in how plump my lips are after using it. I use it twice a day, in the morning while applying all other makeup, lotion etc- let it soak in and then again at night as a part of my nightly routine. I have been considering lip fillers recently just to slightly plump my lips up- not too much- if that's you or you just want a nice full lip look then I say try this out hunny. I bought the clear for the first time but want to try more colors.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Waiting Results
customer_reviews.text: Update 25 April 2019...dont waste your money. Delivery dispenser sucks, and product is worthless for plumping lips!! I immediately opened the product to try it and unfortunately they delivered a defective product. The product does not pump up out of the tube so how can I possibly try it to see if it works! Update: After numerous times pumping the product tube and holding down the button the product eventually came to the surface. I will update my review after I have had a chance to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Pedersen

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price at all
customer_reviews.text: I used to use Grande Lash and I really liked that product so when I found out they had a plumper, I decided to try it. Not good!! I did not see any results at all. This product is only not effective but expensive. I prefer ELF lip plumper. Good luck ladies.
customer_reviews.author: frank carrero

customer_reviews.title: Great color tricky dispenser
customer_reviews.text: I love this product (color, feel, moisture) except the dispenser they have. The angled soft tip is great but I’ve had problems with the pump on it, the lip gloss either won’t come out or it comes out too much all at once...frustrating - they need to change their dispenser because the lip gloss is good IF you can get it to come out. The company that makes it is responsive and will help replace the item.
customer_reviews.author: angel baby

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feelings
customer_reviews.text: So short version is it does plump, not a ton, but it does. The quality of the actual gloss isn’t great and it smears around a lot, but, it barely tingles and does give a nice pout. I wish the gloss was a little thicker or spread more evenly. I bought the spicy mauve color and it is surprisingly nice. Unfortunately, I only had enough for about 10 applications in there...not a whole lot...The packaging was a mess and the box was mangled though...mixed feelings on this one
customer_reviews.author: isis

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizing product
customer_reviews.text: It is very convenient. The button on the bottom lets you apply just enough that you need. No wasted product. I didn't feel a lot of "plumping of my lips" however it makes my lips feel smooth and moist. I can use it whenever, and wherever I want. I would certainly buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: It’s great but...
customer_reviews.text: Formula is great, however the tube was filled with a large air bubble. Basically paid for a mostly-empty tube. Also, the clicker at the bottom isn’t too great, one click isn’t enough to dispense product, but after the second or third click it just spills out a lot of product that I can’t use all at once. Need to rethink the packaging design.
customer_reviews.author: Livie

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a meh product, but was really pleasantly surprised! The packaging falls a bit short, as you have to pump and pump to get a bit of it out and it's slightly stressful bc you don't want to waste any because of the price. But once it comes out it is great. To me the consistency is more like a really thick lip oil. I love it. Plumps and smooths and hydrates. Wish it lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: j. azerina

customer_reviews.title: Great Lip Plumper
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this lipstick plumper. It moisturizing without being to thick or sticky. The color is beautiful and true to the product description. Unlike some lip plumper which sometimes sting slightly, this one goes on like an extra moisturizing lipstick, only there is no bleeding. Love, love, love this product. I will be it again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Judy P.

customer_reviews.title: Broken, but love the product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product back in March. I still had one from a previous purchase so I didn't open it until this week (August). It worked for the first couple of days, but now no longer works. The bottom button you press is locked up. There is also a white ring about the top where you can see the lipstick. Not sure if this means its empty, if it does, then I received a used one, only got two applications out of it. Note....even if you don't need to use the product right away, be sure to check if it works before the return window expires.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: When you click to release product either too much or not enough comes out.
customer_reviews.author: AvaMom

customer_reviews.title: I like the "Grande Cosmetics" line
customer_reviews.text: I like the "Grande Cosmetics" line, as I have used them for several years, especially the Grandelash MD lash growth serum (I LOVE THIS). I was a bit put off by how little there was in this gloss, given the price, but it really does plump the lips up! The tingle is great! And taste is actually not off-putting at all, as some glosses are...would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: victoria hoff

customer_reviews.title: Rich color, fuller appearance, great taste
customer_reviews.text: These aren't lip fillers, so don't expect results that extreme. They do create a full look and have beautiful, rich, natural color without looking like a 80's glossed up teen. I suggest using your favorite chapstick or moisturizer for a long lasting, beautiful effect.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Strause

customer_reviews.title: Bad deal
customer_reviews.text: Completely disappointed. I had trouble getting the product to come out of the tube to begin with and now, I haven't even used it more than 10 times, I can't get any of the product to come out of the tube at all. I didn't notice any plumping when I did use it. I assume I got a defective tube but not going to bother trying to get another.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Big lips?
customer_reviews.text: I don't know whether or not this really increases lip size but I paid less on Amazon than I would have in Sephora. I can say it's very hydrating and gives my lips a nice plush shine.
customer_reviews.author: Caroliiina

customer_reviews.title: Hydrating Lip Plumper - faulty mechanism
customer_reviews.text: The hydrating lip plumper did work but the gadget they created to get out the lip plumper was not great. I was constantly turning it and waiting and waiting. That's was a disappointment. It states it's a moisturizer but I found it drying my lips out
customer_reviews.author: Art & Beth Manansala

customer_reviews.title: I’m Addicted and it Feels Good
customer_reviews.text: Makes lips soft, holds back the fine lines age brings, soft neutral colors look great. No real flavor. It’s a win-win for me.
customer_reviews.author: Eliza

customer_reviews.title: GrandeLips
customer_reviews.text: I like the formula for hydration purposes but it did not make plump my lips up. I didn’t even feel any tingling or a difference in my lips but regardless, I still like the moisture it provides. Since it’s on the pricy side and it doesn’t fully do everything it reports it’d do, I wouldn’t likely repurchase it.
customer_reviews.author: Shantell Designs

customer_reviews.title: Wont purchase again until they change the design
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased so not sure the results of the product quite yet and mainly because the product does not come out properly. I have to keep clicking the black button a good 20-25 time and then it pours out all at once so alot of the product is being wasted.
customer_reviews.author: April Biasi

customer_reviews.title: It might work? For a price...
customer_reviews.text: Used this a few times prior to the photo and was fine (tingles but didn’t notice a crazy difference), may have been slight redness but nothing severe. Then I used it this time and I have no clue what happened but my lips got splotchy and red.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great overall plumping
customer_reviews.text: I started using this from an ipsy sample, and my husband mentioned my lips looked fuller without knowing I was using it. I have noticed an overall difference using it several times a day, even on the days I don't use it.
customer_reviews.author: CSShopper

customer_reviews.title: My go-to gloss
customer_reviews.text: I love Grande Lips & have used it for a while. Def gives a hint of plumpness but if you’re looking for the “fake lip” look this isnt for you. Has a nce shine & gives you’re lips a bit more fulness. Use for at least 30 days to get the cumalitive effect.
customer_reviews.author: PS

customer_reviews.title: Just another expensive lipgloss!
customer_reviews.text: It is really just a lipgloss with some stucky substance in it! Not worth the price. Does not plump anything!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: No change
customer_reviews.text: Used for weeks No change in lips Not a good color for warm tone people They kept sending after I cancelled
customer_reviews.author: CanDo2

customer_reviews.title: Pretty color but not sure if its plumping my lips
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and how my lips look while wearing. Sometimes my lips tingle sometimes the dont. I am not sure if it really works. But love the color! The tube is a bit tricky to use. It takes a few clicks but sometimew it is too much.
customer_reviews.author: Leanna

customer_reviews.title: spring is no good.
customer_reviews.text: What ever you call the plunger or whatever you pump to get the product out stopped working the first time I tried to pump it. I finally got the plunger to stop sticking, but only lasted for 1 time. I think the product would be good, if only I could get to it!
customer_reviews.author: Darla Frazier

customer_reviews.title: didnt work
customer_reviews.text: product only worked on the first application, it felt tingly and i could actually see a little of plumpness on my lips. I tried a second time and I did not feel anything, but i did see a little bit of plumpness. By the third time (which was the second day because its suppose to be twice a day) I felt nothing and saw no changes. I continued to use for 5 days and NOTHING. I want my money back!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alex alarcon

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: I really do see results with this! I tried using for about 30 days over 2 years ago and saw a difference. I stopped using it thinking maybe it wasn’t attributed to the gloss or I was going crazy... and then they got less plump over time! I’m now back to using it, and love the difference it makes long term! They are a little more plump even first waking up in the morning. I use twice daily.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: It was disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: Usually I love this product. This time... it did not dispense the way it usually does, difficult for the gloss to come out. It did not tingle... wondering if the formula was changed or if it wasn't fresh. Sad.
customer_reviews.author: Halley Elise, B Div, C Ht

customer_reviews.title: Too sticky feeling and no plumping effect
customer_reviews.text: Too thick and sticky feeling for me. It is quite viscous and feels gummy on my lips, but never yielded any plumping effect. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kayreen K Gucciardo

customer_reviews.title: Hydrating and perfect color
customer_reviews.text: I really like the color and it isn’t sticky like other lip glosses. It’s hydrating and stays on well. I don’t like actual tube though. You have to click it from the bottom and if left in a purse or pocket it gets pushed
customer_reviews.author: Briana Kovash

customer_reviews.title: A traveling lip gloss & that's not good.
customer_reviews.text: This will travel from your lips to the general chin, nose area. Such a shame because I love the other Grande products. Didn't see any lip fullness, I guess because it traveled all over the lower part of my face.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and how it makes your lips look fuller even when you don’t have any lol Only thing I don’t like is the way Way it comes out wish it had a wand or something.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice plumping that does appear to last over prolonged use, I didn't experience the discomfort some described. A tiny drop goes along way. Ill be purchasing it again.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: No miracles here
customer_reviews.text: This made my lips tingle, but I didn’t notice significant plumping action.
customer_reviews.author: chsj

customer_reviews.title: Unique Application
customer_reviews.text: I love the application of this lipgloss. I bought the clear and it is thick and stays on. I did not notice any lip plumping; but, I don't wait to stare at myself in the mirror after application. I like it well enough that I may try a color.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite lip plumper I have ever tried
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite lip plumper I have ever tried. I use it in clear in the morning and at night, and one of the colored ones in the day if I'm out. It makes my lips soft and plumps better than any of the more expensive products I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Tracie

customer_reviews.title: I’ve had better
customer_reviews.text: I saw a review video where someone was slobbering because their lips went numb. Let me tell you the two faced lip injection is cheaper and works better than this. Maybe I just eat a lot of spicy foods and this doesn’t effect me as much but I did not get one tingle.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Will be buying again
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! I read some mixed reviews but had seen it used in a YouTube channel I was watching. This stuff doesn’t necessarily make my lips feel any bigger but it is super moisturizing and smells great. I’ll def be buying again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grandelips
customer_reviews.text: Love the one with light color. I have this product in my purse, upstairs and downstairs. Can’t live without it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lovin

customer_reviews.title: Hate the applicator
customer_reviews.text: I like the product but I hate the dispenser applicator...hate it! Takes a long time and it's either too little or too much and the color fades super quick
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Waste
customer_reviews.text: It gives a nice glossy shine and keeps my lips moisturized for a while before I have to reapply unless I’m eating. Only downside is that it did NOT make my lips bigger...I felt the tingling sensation but saw no results...unfortunate because a lot of the reviews claimed it works - don’t waste your money. Victoria’s Secret works better
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Just Hype
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many lip plumpers. This one has more hype regarding what it promises to do and no results. A waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Allyn

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: Did nothing to me, really dense and not very flattering.
customer_reviews.author: Kikka

customer_reviews.title: Keeps its promise
customer_reviews.text: Love the very subtle “flavor” and the effects this product delivers when used as instructed!!! Using at least 2x a day for even 4-5 days WILL plump the lips...even if starting with lips as thin as mine, I notice the fullness with repeated use. It does tingle a bit initially, but I’ve gotten used to it and like it!
customer_reviews.author: torri

customer_reviews.title: Applicator useless
customer_reviews.text: The brush is useless-splayed all over, not usable. I have to use a applicator from another lip color but doesnt fit the tube, so have to go back and forth.
customer_reviews.author: JACQUE JOHNSON

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive for what it benefits
customer_reviews.text: is a normal lip moisturizer does not have the described effect. I used it for 30 days without any change
customer_reviews.author: Maria Delgado

customer_reviews.title: No Plump
customer_reviews.text: Tingles, but, no plumping of the lips....LOL I do like the color however so that is a plus. Product is too expensive for what they advertise for expected results.
customer_reviews.author: DMT

customer_reviews.title: No results for me
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping to see a difference but all I got was a tingling feeling in my lips. If I saw a difference I would buy again but I won’t be purchasing anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: It's OK
customer_reviews.text: I like it for a lip gloss but it doesn't do much else.... the dispenser doesn't always work and it's expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: dispenser is disfunctional
customer_reviews.text: the product is nice. If you can get it out of the tube! The click dispenser is way too complicated for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, horrible application
customer_reviews.text: I love the product but the tube is ridiculous and doesn't work very well to dispense the liquid. This company seems to have a problem with packaging - I also bought a smaller tube with a wand and it broke immediately. Good product but until they figure out the packaging, I won't be buying any more.
customer_reviews.author: Jess G.

customer_reviews.title: No Plump
customer_reviews.text: I received a sample of the clear lip plumper and loved it, it really plumped my lips and I could feel it working. Not so with this barely there lip plumper. I was very disappointed in this particular product and won't buy a color plumper again.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Painter

customer_reviews.title: They look a fuller 😘
customer_reviews.text: Really Like it..Love the Color... Lips feel hydrated and softer. No sting just a cooling efect..& great staying power with a bit of plump
customer_reviews.author: Shann 🎀 Shann

customer_reviews.title: ... a sample from one of my Sephora purchases and liked the color in addition to "plumping" lip part
customer_reviews.text: I received as a sample from one of my Sephora purchases and liked the color in addition to "plumping" lip part. If looking for a nude color with a little extra, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: Very Pretty Color
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty color. This definitely moisturizes better than any other chap stick, EOS, etc. that I've tried. I just started using it so I can't comment on whether the item works for plumping your lips.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: stings so BAD !!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: States right in ad and on product "This does not sting like other lip plumpers " But it does - and it is too bad, the color is pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pump never worked
customer_reviews.text: In general I love the Grandelips. I bought this product on Prime day but did not need it until now. When i opened it, the pump absolutely will not work. I have tried and tried and now i have an unusable lip gloss. I would love to exchange it, but using amazon makes that impossible after 30 days! Don't make my mistake!
customer_reviews.author: Arlene Burckle

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this gloss. My lips have never felt softer or have looked fuller. It takes a few clicks before the product to come out when I first used it but it’s an A+ in my book
customer_reviews.author: cc

customer_reviews.title: Hmmmm
customer_reviews.text: It does not make your lips Bigger, maybe soft but not bigger. You feel like tickling.
customer_reviews.author: Soni

customer_reviews.title: Ok... When I can get it out the tube
customer_reviews.text: Does plump a bit but the color payoff isn't the best against my medium skin tone. And the dispensing mechanism is confounding
customer_reviews.author: Elle Bee

customer_reviews.title: Hardly any product in tube so not worth it for me.
customer_reviews.text: Could only apply at night as it messed with my lipstick during day. Saw some plumping but would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: patti

customer_reviews.title: True story this morning after using product for 3 days ...
customer_reviews.text: True story this morning after using product for 3 days: Hubby says: omg ... your lips are swollen!! Need I say more??? I purchased clear and now I’m off to get the other colors! No needles for me!!
customer_reviews.author: Caychlo

customer_reviews.title: Nice product pump could be better
customer_reviews.text: Works well only the applicator or pump could be better. My lips dry out easily. This is not the best I’ve used but better than others.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special
customer_reviews.text: Nothing special and yes there is minimal stinging. I didn’t notice any difference as far as “plumpness “ Goes. Pretty color though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Has no flavor but my daughter and I love! Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Howell

customer_reviews.title: Tip doesn’t dispense.
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty excited about this because of the color and gloss, but it was sticky, non-plumping, and the worst part was that the tip would not dispense so it had to be pulled off every time, getting everything else sticky as well. Not a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Holgate

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work at plumping or moisturizing lips in any way .Packaging is great and that’s about it .
customer_reviews.author: Olive Misceo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect compliment to a perfect nude
customer_reviews.text: Color is a little light...but perfect!!! Lips feel softer!! If you are looking for a nice it's perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy R.

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizes, but odd packaging
customer_reviews.text: It does moisturize, not sure about plumping, but does leave hydrated shiny lips. The orifice of the device though is very hard to use, like a ball point pen concept.
customer_reviews.author: sss

customer_reviews.title: Great hydration!!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t really need much lip plumping I mainly Got it because I was told it has good hydration and my lips tend to crack and peel about every 2 days and this has almost eliminated it completely. My lips are extremely soft and smooth throughout the day!
customer_reviews.author: Diego

customer_reviews.title: I've only been using it for a few nights, ...
customer_reviews.text: I've only been using it for a few nights, but my lips are sensitive and its working on them!!! They're already more full. Even my husband says so!
customer_reviews.author: SNL

customer_reviews.title: Need to return this.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like this product and would like to return it. How do I do that since the return date has closed.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the tingly sensation. My lips get moisturized and plumped instantly. Love it
customer_reviews.author: nick abitia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I use it as a lip gloss, long lasting, great color too
customer_reviews.author: Linda Frost

customer_reviews.title: The color is great. The push/click to get the color to come ...
customer_reviews.text: The color is great. The push/click to get the color to come out, is awful. I would not purchase this again because of that.
customer_reviews.author: Adoorbell

customer_reviews.title: Works amazingly
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a gift for my friend and we both love it.
customer_reviews.author: Shanna

customer_reviews.title: Nice Color and Shine
customer_reviews.text: I love the color and the shine. I didn't feel any tingling at all. I am still in the process of using it, so I don't know if it is causing any lip plumpness. But, I do like the color and shine. A bit different to put on as you have to pump it, but, I'm getting used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Dillow

customer_reviews.title: WASTE
customer_reviews.text: This product was a waste of money i spent 27.00$ on basically lip gloss.....I wanted what my friend had because it made my lips look nice and bigger but when I got this product it was opened and all it did was make my lips look glossy and no tingly feeling.
customer_reviews.author: makennah

customer_reviews.title: applicator does not work
customer_reviews.text: The applicator is not user friendly. Takes several times pumping the button to get the product. I will not buy this again. If I could select zero stars I would!
customer_reviews.author: Janette Burns

customer_reviews.title: Was not happy trying to cancel to no avail
customer_reviews.text: Canceling this item and was charged for it not happy with it ... it went in the trash!!! I had canceled the same day it was shown!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: June m Votaw

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Pumps very little out of tube. Doesn't really do anything
customer_reviews.author: Susan Collins

customer_reviews.title: Great color
customer_reviews.text: Love the color but I haven’t seen a difference in my lip size.
customer_reviews.author: Karla A.

customer_reviews.title: Plumped lips
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, seems to plump lips at the tome of application; however, does not seem to have permanent effect. Tube does not last a long time unfortunately for the price :( Atill a great lip gloss though!
customer_reviews.author: Autumn DeLorme

customer_reviews.title: I very much like this product however it needs to be reapplied often
customer_reviews.text: I very much like this product however it needs to be reapplied often. I like everything else about it, even the taste! I have other shades as well and do recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: mkat64

customer_reviews.title: I think my favorite thing about it is it really defines the edges ...
customer_reviews.text: I have “barely there”. I’ve worn it by itself, under and on top of other lipsticks. Definitely has almost immediate and very noticeable plumping effects. I think my favorite thing about it is it really defines the edges of your lips, almost like a natural lipliner. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: GOOD GLOSS/NOT MUCH ELSE
customer_reviews.text: This product serves well as a lip gloss, but it does nothing to boost lips.
customer_reviews.author: MaiaM

product_meta.title: GrandeLIPS Hydrating Lip Plumper, Gloss
product_meta.description:
Color:ClearGet fuller looking lips, with no stings attached! GrandeLIPS Hydrating Lip Plumper is a high gloss, volumizing lip plumper infused with a nourishing cocktail of Volulip™ and hyaluronic acid for instant and long-term hydrating benefits. This plumper instantly improves lip volume in 3-5 minutes and hydrates dry areas. Plus, when used 2x daily for 30 days, see an increase in overall lip volume. GrandeLIPS’ unique cushion applicator easily wipes clean & combines effortlessly with other lip products. GrandeLIPS Clear Ingredients: Octyldodecanol, Polybutene, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Flavor/Aroma, Cetearyl Ethylhexanoate, Quaternium-90 Bentonite, Menthoxypropanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Methyl Nicotinate, Propylene Carbonate, Butylene Glycol, Sorbitan Isostearate, Saccharin, Sodium Chondroitin Sulfate, Caffeine, Niacin, Portulaca Pilosa Extract, Atelocollagen, Phenoxyethanol, Hexylene Glycol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Sucrose Cocoate, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-38, Benzyl Benzoate

BRAND STORY
Enhance your own natural beauty with the Grande Collection! Our mission is for you to be able to enhance your own natural features, including your real lashes, lips, brows & hair with safe & effective formulas.

specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
